description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任海南省水务厅厅长，后因涉嫌受贿被查处。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China, formerly the Director of the Hainan Provincial Department of Water Resources, who was later investigated for suspected bribery.

description.zh-cn: 海南省下辖的地级市，李洪波的家乡。
description.en: A prefecture-level city in Hainan Province, the hometown of Li Hongbo.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的国家，通常简称为中国。
description.en: A country in East Asia, commonly known as China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在海南省保亭县的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Chinese Communist Party in Baoting County, Hainan Province.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在原海南省通什市的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Chinese Communist Party in the former Tongshi City, Hainan Province.

description.zh-cn: 原海南省通什市的人民代表大会常设机关。
description.en: The standing committee of the People's Congress in the former Tongshi City, Hainan Province.

description.zh-cn: 海南省负责农业事务的政府部门。
description.en: The government department responsible for agricultural affairs in Hainan Province.

nodes.id: 海南省扶贫开发领导小组办公室

zh-cn: 海南省扶贫开发领导小组办公室
en: Hainan Provincial Leading Group Office for Poverty Alleviation and Development

description.zh-cn: 海南省负责扶贫开发工作的机构。
description.en: The office responsible for poverty alleviation and development in Hainan Province.

description.zh-cn: 海南省负责水务管理的政府部门，后改组为水务厅。
description.en: The government department responsible for water affairs management in Hainan Province, later reorganized into the Department of Water Resources.

en: Hainan Provincial Department of Water Resources

description.zh-cn: 海南省负责水务管理的政府部门。
description.en: The government department responsible for water affairs management in Hainan Province.

nodes.id: 海南省人民检察院第一分院

zh-cn: 海南省人民检察院第一分院
en: First Branch of Hainan Provincial People's Procuratorate

description.zh-cn: 海南省人民检察院的分支机构，负责特定区域的检察工作。
description.en: A branch of the Hainan Provincial People's Procuratorate, responsible for procuratorial work in a specific area.

nodes.id: 海南省第五届人大常委会

zh-cn: 海南省第五届人大常委会
en: Standing Committee of the 5th People's Congress of Hainan Province

description.zh-cn: 海南省第五届人民代表大会的常设机关。
description.en: The standing body of the 5th People's Congress of Hainan Province.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 李洪波是海南儋州人。
description.en: Li Hongbo is a native of Danzhou, Hainan.

position.zh-cn: 常委、组织部部长、副书记
position.en: Member of the Standing Committee, Head of the Organization Department, Deputy Secretary

description.zh-cn: 李洪波曾历任海南省保亭县委常委、组织部部长、保亭县委副书记。
description.en: Li Hongbo successively served as a member of the Standing Committee of the Baoting County Party Committee, Head of the Organization Department, and Deputy Secretary of the Baoting County Party Committee in Hainan Province.

description.zh-cn: 李洪波曾担任通什市委书记。
description.en: Li Hongbo served as the Secretary of the Tongshi Municipal Party Committee.

description.zh-cn: 李洪波曾担任通什市人大常委会主任。
description.en: Li Hongbo served as the Director of the Standing Committee of the Tongshi Municipal People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 李洪波曾担任海南省农业厅副厅长。
description.en: Li Hongbo served as the Deputy Director of the Hainan Provincial Department of Agriculture.

relationships.target: 海南省扶贫开发领导小组办公室

position.en: Director (Deputy Department Level), Party Group Secretary

description.zh-cn: 李洪波曾担任海南省扶贫开发领导小组办公室主任（副厅级）、党组书记。
description.en: Li Hongbo served as the Director (Deputy Department Level) and Party Group Secretary of the Hainan Provincial Leading Group Office for Poverty Alleviation and Development.

description.zh-cn: 2007年3月，李洪波任海南省水务局局长。
description.en: In March 2007, Li Hongbo was appointed Director of the Hainan Provincial Water Affairs Bureau.

description.zh-cn: 2009年5月，李洪波任海南省水务厅厅长，直至2015年5月27日被免职。
description.en: In May 2009, Li Hongbo was appointed Director of the Hainan Provincial Department of Water Resources, a position he held until his removal on May 27, 2015.

relationships.source: 海南省人民检察院第一分院

description.zh-cn: 海南省人民检察院第一分院对海南省水务厅厅长李洪波涉嫌受贿犯罪立案侦查。
description.en: The First Branch of the Hainan Provincial People's Procuratorate opened an investigation into Li Hongbo, Director of the Hainan Provincial Department of Water Resources, for suspected bribery.

relationships.source: 海南省第五届人大常委会

description.zh-cn: 海南省第五届人大常委会第十五次会议决定免去李洪波海南省水务厅厅长职务。
description.en: The 15th session of the Standing Committee of the 5th People's Congress of Hainan Province decided to remove Li Hongbo from his position as Director of the Hainan Provincial Department of Water Resources.

description.zh-cn: 李洪波是中国共产党党员。
description.en: Li Hongbo is a member of the Communist Party of China.
